quote_last: , and while the rest of the family dozed, Sasha went over the speech he would deliver on arrival at the airport. He also needed to prepare a eulogy for his uncle’s funeral, but that would have to wait until they checked into their hotel.
title: Heads You Win
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: Uh-oh. Vance felt the tracks suddenly shiver. Then with what sounded like a painful grind of metal on metal, the gantry started moving again. They’d decided to override the safety shutoff.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover

quote_first: Nobody had been one of Mycroft Ward’s most important operatives and for sixty seconds every day, between
quote_last: and 12.22 am., his laptop was permitted to connect directly with the gigantic online database of self that was Mycroft Ward’s mind.
title: The Raw Shark Texts
author: Steven Hall
